mapper.select: SELECT n.c_code AS c_code, (n.base_r - e.base_r) AS baseRDifference FROM ( SELECT c_code, base_r, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY rate_date DESC, annotime DESC) AS num FROM noticeExchangerate ) n JOIN ( SELECT c_code, base_r, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY rate_date DESC) AS num FROM exchangerate ) e ON n.c_code = e.c_code WHERE n.num = 1 AND e.num = 1
